data.title: V – Safe & Sporty Compact SUV Crossover
data.meta_description: Explore the 2025 Honda CR-V, a compact SUV crossover that's equally safe & sporty. Fuel efficiency, modern styling, and plenty of cargo space come standard.
data.text:
Sport Touring Hybrid shown in Canyon River Blue Metallic.

STYLING

Sport Styling

A large, gloss-black grille lends a forceful character to the front fascia, complemented by details like the Sport Touring Hybrid-exclusive platinum accent lower bumper.

Sport Touring Hybrid shown in Canyon River Blue Metallic. 18-inch gloss-black alloy wheels standard on Sport Hybrid and Sport-L Hybrid. 19-inch gloss-black alloy wheels standard on Sport Touring Hybrid.

STYLING

Gloss-Black Alloy Wheels

Hybrid trims feature gloss-black alloy wheels, giving them a dramatic presence to match their electrifying driving dynamics.

Sport Touring Hybrid with AWD shown in Canyon River Blue Metallic.

STYLING

LED Headlights

Dual low-beam LED headlights provide bright, distinctive illumination, with the convenience of auto-on/off functionality.

Sport Touring Hybrid shown in Canyon River Blue Metallic.

STYLING

Profile

A powerful stance, accentuated by a sporty roofline, brings the rugged look together from end to end.

Sport Touring Hybrid with AWD shown in Canyon River Blue Metallic.

STYLING

LED Taillights

Vertical taillights have been a hallmark of CR-V design since its inception. The latest look brings a modern edge, with an instantly recognizable LED pattern.

Sport Touring Hybrid shown in Canyon River Blue Metallic.

STYLING

Dual Chrome Exhaust Finishers

Rounding out the sporty styling of the hybrid trims, dual chrome exhaust finishers add a performance-inspired sign-off to the rear design.

EX with available AWD shown in Urban Gray Pearl* with HPD™ Package and Honda Genuine Accessories.* 18-inch HPD™ bronze alloy wheels available as a separate accessory.

ACCESSORIES

HPD™ Package

Show the world you’re the proud owner of a CR-V equipped with the HPD™ Package, the ultimate statement of design and engineering by Honda. The package includes a tailgate spoiler, HPD emblem, HPD decals, fender flares, and more.

Sport Hybrid with available AWD shown in Meteorite Gray Metallic with Honda Genuine Accessories.

ACCESSORIES

Utility Package

Outfit your CR-V to fit your lifestyle and the adventure ahead. The Utility Package includes roof rails, crossbars, running boards, a trailer hitch, and seatback protectors.

ACCESSORIES

Tailgate Spoiler

The tailgate spoiler is all about style. Miles of it. It complements the styling of the CR-V for a sportier, unique look. It’s made of injection-molded ABS for durability and a perfect fit.

Some components and colors may vary. Please see your Honda dealer for details.

ACCESSORIES

Fender Emblems

Accentuate the look of your CR-V with fender emblems. Their bold look is designed to further express your own personal style.

Some components and colors may vary. Please see your Honda dealer for details.

ACCESSORIES

Running Boards

Give your CR-V a super-aggressive look while increasing side splash protection. The main structure is steel, for strength and corrosion resistance. An injection-molded polypropylene plate with custom step pad provides added eye appeal.

Cannot be installed with door edge film, door edge guards, or splash guard set. Some components and colors may vary. Please see your Honda dealer for details.

ACCESSORIES

Fender Flares

Going for an extra-rugged look? Fender flares add muscle-flexing detail to your CR-V. They’re made of durable polypropylene material for long life, and designed to match the texture and color of the factory trim.

STYLING

Sport Styling

A large, gloss-black grille lends a forceful character to the front fascia, complemented by details like the Sport Touring Hybrid-exclusive platinum accent lower bumper.

STYLING

Gloss-Black Alloy Wheels

Hybrid trims feature gloss-black alloy wheels, giving them a dramatic presence to match their electrifying driving dynamics.

STYLING

LED Headlights

Dual low-beam LED headlights provide bright, distinctive illumination, with the convenience of auto-on/off functionality.

STYLING

Profile

A powerful stance, accentuated by a sporty roofline, brings the rugged look together from end to end.

STYLING

LED Taillights

Vertical taillights have been a hallmark of CR-V design since its inception. The latest look brings a modern edge, with an instantly recognizable LED pattern.

STYLING

Dual Chrome Exhaust Finishers

Rounding out the sporty styling of the hybrid trims, dual chrome exhaust finishers add a performance-inspired sign-off to the rear design.

ACCESSORIES

HPD™ Package

Show the world you’re the proud owner of a CR-V equipped with the HPD™ Package, the ultimate statement of design and engineering by Honda. The package includes a tailgate spoiler, HPD emblem, HPD decals, fender flares, and more.

ACCESSORIES

Utility Package

Outfit your CR-V to fit your lifestyle and the adventure ahead. The Utility Package includes roof rails, crossbars, running boards, a trailer hitch, and seatback protectors.

ACCESSORIES

Tailgate Spoiler

The tailgate spoiler is all about style. Miles of it. It complements the styling of the CR-V for a sportier, unique look. It’s made of injection-molded ABS for durability and a perfect fit.

ACCESSORIES

Fender Emblems

Accentuate the look of your CR-V with fender emblems. Their bold look is designed to further express your own personal style.

ACCESSORIES

Running Boards

Give your CR-V a super-aggressive look while increasing side splash protection. The main structure is steel, for strength and corrosion resistance. An injection-molded polypropylene plate with custom step pad provides added eye appeal.

ACCESSORIES

Fender Flares

Going for an extra-rugged look? Fender flares add muscle-flexing detail to your CR-V. They’re made of durable polypropylene material for long life, and designed to match the texture and color of the factory trim.

Sport Touring Hybrid shown with Black Leather. Leather-trimmed seats standard on EX-L, Sport-L Hybrid, and Sport Touring Hybrid.

CABIN

Leather-Trimmed Seating

Add an extra measure of comfort and style to your cabin with leather-trimmed seats.

Sport Touring Hybrid shown with Black Leather. Cloth seats with orange stitching standard on Sport Hybrid. Leather-trimmed seats with orange stitching standard on Sport-L Hybrid and Sport Touring Hybrid.

CABIN

Sport Styling

Hybrid trims feature orange contrast stitching on their seats, steering wheel, and shift knob, creating a sporty driving atmosphere from the moment you enter.

Sport Touring Hybrid shown.

CABIN

Power-Adjustable Seating

A 10-way power-adjustable driver seat with 2-way power lumbar support comes standard on EX and above. EX-L, Sport-L Hybrid, and Sport Touring Hybrid add two-position memory for the driver seat, as well as a power-adjustable front passenger seat.

Sport Touring Hybrid shown.

CABIN

Driver Information Interface

An intuitive driver information interface puts important vehicle information right where you need it, including Adaptive Cruise Control with Low-Speed Follow* and Lane Keeping Assist System* status, as well as AWD and hybrid power meters on applicable trims.

Sport Touring Hybrid shown with Black Leather.

CABIN

Center Console

The spacious center console is big enough for most handheld items, with inner and outer trays to help you keep smaller items close at hand.

Sport Touring Hybrid shown. Bose premium sound system standard on Sport Touring Hybrid.

AMENITIES

Bose Premium Sound System

Hear every note in rich detail with the Bose premium sound system, featuring Centerpoint surround-sound technology.*

Sport Touring Hybrid shown with Gray Leather. One-touch power moonroof standard on EX and above.

AMENITIES

One-Touch Power Moonroof

Blue skies and fresh air are at your fingertips with the one-touch power moonroof.

Sport Touring Hybrid shown. Dual-zone automatic climate control standard on EX and above.

AMENITIES

Dual-Zone Automatic Climate Control

There’s no need to compromise on comfort. The dual-zone automatic climate control system allows you and your front passenger to each set your preferred temperature.

Sport Touring Hybrid shown in Canyon River Blue Metallic with Black Leather. Heated front seats standard on EX and above.

AMENITIES

Heated Seats and Steering Wheel

Chilly mornings are no match for the radiant warmth of the heated front seats. With the Sport Touring Hybrid, you’ll also get a heated steering wheel to keep your hands nice and toasty.

ACCESSORIES

Illuminated Door Sill Trim

A finishing touch that is subtle, tasteful, and decidedly upscale, the illuminated door sill trim dresses up the interior while helping protect the lower door sill from scuff marks.

Sport Touring Hybrid with accessory all-season floor mats shown with Black Leather. Some components and colors may vary. Please see your Honda dealer for details.

ACCESSORIES

All-Season Floor Mats

The extended sidewalls of the high-wall all-season floor mats* add extra protection to shield your original carpets from the wear and tear of everyday driving. Made of durable, easy-to-clean material, they’re specially designed to trap dirt.

Sport Touring Hybrid with accessory seatback protectors shown with Black Leather.

ACCESSORIES

Seatback Protectors

The seatback protectors help protect the backs of the seats when folded down to load longer items. They’re made of high-quality molded plastic for maximum durability, with a textured surface that helps prevent items from shifting and sliding.

Sport Touring Hybrid with accessory seatback protectors shown with Black Leather.

ACCESSORIES

Cargo Cover

The cargo cover keeps items in the back out of view and helps protect them from damaging UV rays. Made of screen-type material, it’s fully retractable and clips behind the second-row seatback.

CABIN

Leather-Trimmed Seating

Add an extra measure of comfort and style to your cabin with leather-trimmed seats.

CABIN

Sport Styling

Hybrid trims feature orange contrast stitching on their seats, steering wheel, and shift knob, creating a sporty driving atmosphere from the moment you enter.

CABIN

Power-Adjustable Seating

A 10-way power-adjustable driver seat with 2-way power lumbar support comes standard on EX and above. EX-L, Sport-L Hybrid, and Sport Touring Hybrid add two-position memory for the driver seat, as well as a power-adjustable front passenger seat.

CABIN

Driver Information Interface

An intuitive driver information interface puts important vehicle information right where you need it, including Adaptive Cruise Control with Low-Speed Follow* and Lane Keeping Assist System* status, as well as AWD and hybrid power meters on applicable trims.

CABIN

Center Console

The spacious center console is big enough for most handheld items, with inner and outer trays to help you keep smaller items close at hand.

AMENITIES

Bose Premium Sound System

Hear every note in rich detail with the Bose premium sound system, featuring Centerpoint surround-sound technology.*

AMENITIES

One-Touch Power Moonroof

Blue skies and fresh air are at your fingertips with the one-touch power moonroof.

AMENITIES

Dual-Zone Automatic Climate Control

There’s no need to compromise on comfort. The dual-zone automatic climate control system allows you and your front passenger to each set your preferred temperature.

AMENITIES

Heated Seats and Steering Wheel

Chilly mornings are no match for the radiant warmth of the heated front seats. With the Sport Touring Hybrid, you’ll also get a heated steering wheel to keep your hands nice and toasty.

ACCESSORIES

Illuminated Door Sill Trim

A finishing touch that is subtle, tasteful, and decidedly upscale, the illuminated door sill trim dresses up the interior while helping protect the lower door sill from scuff marks.

ACCESSORIES

All-Season Floor Mats

The extended sidewalls of the high-wall all-season floor mats* add extra protection to shield your original carpets from the wear and tear of everyday driving. Made of durable, easy-to-clean material, they’re specially designed to trap dirt.

ACCESSORIES

Seatback Protectors

The seatback protectors help protect the backs of the seats when folded down to load longer items. They’re made of high-quality molded plastic for maximum durability, with a textured surface that helps prevent items from shifting and sliding.

ACCESSORIES

Cargo Cover

The cargo cover keeps items in the back out of view and helps protect them from damaging UV rays. Made of screen-type material, it’s fully retractable and clips behind the second-row seatback.

Sport Touring Hybrid shown. Wireless Apple CarPlay® compatibility standard on EX-L, Sport-L Hybrid, and Sport Touring Hybrid.

CONNECTIVITY

Apple CarPlay® Compatibility

Access your iPhone® map, audio, and messaging apps through the touch-screen with Apple CarPlay® compatibility.* And with available wireless compatibility, you can connect without the cable.

Sport Touring Hybrid shown. Wireless Android Auto™ compatibility standard on EX-L, Sport-L Hybrid, and Sport Touring Hybrid.

CONNECTIVITY

Android Auto™ Compatibility

Get directions, send text messages, and access your compatible Android™ phone’s music library, all through the touch-screen.* Available wireless compatibility lets you connect from anywhere in the car—no cable necessary.

Sport Touring Hybrid shown. 9-inch touch-screen standard on EX-L, Sport-L Hybrid, and Sport Touring Hybrid.

CONNECTIVITY

9-Inch Touch-Screen

The 9-inch touch-screen is designed for easy use, with features like a finger rest that helps keep your hand steady, and Smart Shortcuts that learn your preferences and make it easy to find your favorite apps.

Sport Touring Hybrid shown. Wireless phone charger standard on EX-L, Sport-L Hybrid, and Sport Touring Hybrid.

AMENITIES

Wireless Phone Charger

No cord? No problem. Simply place your compatible phone on the wireless phone charger* to start powering up.

HondaLink® Subscription Services* standard on Sport Touring Hybrid.

CONNECTIVITY

HondaLink®

With the Remote package* on the HondaLink® smartphone app, available on the App Store® and Google Play™ store, you can find your parked vehicle, remotely lock and unlock it, start the engine, set the temperature inside, and so much more.*

Sport Touring Hybrid shown.

CONNECTIVITY

Front and Rear USB Ports

Every CR-V includes a USB port for charging and smartphone audio connectivity, while EX and higher trims add front and rear USB-C ports for even faster charging.

Blind spot information system with cross traffic monitor standard on EX, Sport Hybrid, EX-L, Sport-L Hybrid, and Sport Touring Hybrid.

PEACE OF MIND

Blind Spot Information System

The blind spot information system* can detect and alert you to the presence of vehicles to the side of your CR-V.

Sport Touring Hybrid shown in Canyon River Blue Metallic. Blind spot information system with cross traffic monitor standard on EX, Sport Hybrid, EX-L, Sport-L Hybrid, and Sport Touring Hybrid.

PEACE OF MIND

Cross Traffic Monitor

Cross traffic monitor* can alert you to approaching vehicles detected when you’re backing up.

Sport Touring Hybrid shown in Canyon River Blue Metallic. Parking sensors standard on EX-L, Sport-L Hybrid, and Sport Touring Hybrid.

PEACE OF MIND

Parking Sensors

The CR-V can alert you when its parking sensors detect that you’re approaching a vehicle or other object as you back up or pull forward.

Sport Touring Hybrid shown.

PEACE OF MIND

Multi-Angle Rearview Camera

Shift your CR-V into Reverse and you’ll be able to choose from three different angles—normal, top-down, and wide—to get a better view of what’s behind you through the multi-angle rearview camera.*

Sport Touring Hybrid shown in Canyon River Blue Metallic with Honda Genuine Accessories. Smart Entry with Walk Away Auto Lock® standard on EX and above.

PEACE OF MIND

Walk Away Auto Lock®

After you park and shut the doors, just walk away from the CR-V with the key fob to lock up automatically. When you come back, you can unlock just by grabbing one of the front-door handles.
